name: Disrupting PSN Information Networks
description: Neutralizing PSNs’ ability to spread information and coordinate operations.

cards.title: Identifying Hidden Communication Channels
cards.description: Mapping the covert networks PSNs use to spread disinformation.
bulletpoints: Tracking patterns in online forums and encrypted chat groups.
Analyzing keywords and behavioral shifts to identify covert communication.
Using OSINT techniques to uncover hidden networks.

cards.title: Severing Internal Coordination
cards.description: Cutting off PSNs’ ability to organize and execute their strategies.
bulletpoints: Injecting misinformation to disrupt their operational plans.
Causing internal conflicts by exploiting hierarchical weaknesses.
Redirecting their focus to non-critical issues to waste resources.

cards.title: Destabilizing Their Influence Networks
cards.description: Breaking the mechanisms that allow PSNs to manipulate others.
bulletpoints: Targeting key influencers to weaken their recruitment pipelines.
Using rapid-response counter-messaging to intercept disinformation.
Creating psychological pressure points that force PSNs to overreact.
